did.unittitle: Rockefeller University records, Special Events and Activities, Rockefollies

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements note
phystech.p: Materials requiring specialized equipment for access (film, audio, video, slides) may be closed to research dependent on availability of the applicable equipment
Brittle or damaged items, or materials otherwise in need of preservation care, may be closed to researchers at the discretion of the RAC Head of Archival Services/Head of Reference.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation note
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for scholarly research, with select materials restricted as noted.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: In 1987 Yvonne Holland and various staff and faculty members formed a group to plan and coordinate a revue utilizing the talents of faculty and staff members. The first show was entitled RUREVUE and was performed on May 15, 1987. The next programs entitled ROCKEFOLLIES were performed on April 22, 1988 and March 22, 1990. There was no show in 1989.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: RAC is unable to provide access to obsolete media. When feasible, a digital surrogate may be created via special order. All applicable charges will apply. See RAC Head of Archival Services or RAC Head of Digital Programs for details.
